EmailTemplate.name: 02_25_2015 Pure Channel Blast.02_25_15 Channel Blast
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] Today - Sell Flash in a Flash with Pure Storage & VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022515> VARs: What if you could sell Flash in a Flash? Optimize Virtualization With Pure Storage & VMTurbo <http://vmturbo.com/pure-storage-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022515> Attend this exclusive webinar from Pure Storage <http://purestorage.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022515> and VMTurbo to learn about the brand new Pure Storage Control Module and how it can help you sell more flash. VMTurbo’s Pure Storage Control Module extends control through the virtual datastore and into the volumes of your Pure FlashArray, enabling you to:
- Maximize return of your customers' Pure Storage investment through proper sizing, placement, and configuration decisions both upstream and downstream of their Pure controllers - Manage customers' heterogeneous storage environments by identifying which workloads require flash and when - Plan for the future to onboard additional FlashArrays with a priori insight of the all-flash impact on performance and efficiency
Join the Revolution, and learn about this exciting new solution Today! February, 25th at 1:30 PM EST Register Now! <http://vmturbo.com/pure-storage-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022515> <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022515> Downloads <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022515> White Papers <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022515> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
